content.question: Which of the following would be the best use of citizen science?

choices.label: An experiment that requires all participants to be working in the same laboratory
An experiment that requires expensive equipment to conduct
An experiment that requires data measurements to be taken in many different locations
An experiment that requires specialized knowledge and training to conduct

content.answer: An experiment that requires data measurements to be taken in many different locations

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how collaboration affects the development of a solution.
